painPoints.title: Operational efficiency
painPoints.description: Seeking ways to improve processes and reduce manual work.
painPoints.impact: Time and resource constraints limiting growth.

report.executiveSummary: Identified 1-person buyer group for Western Governors University ($950,000 deal) with 37% cohesion score. Group includes 1 decision maker(s), 0 champion(s), and comprehensive cross-functional coverage. Research methodology validated 1 final members from 2 initial candidates.

stages.name: Company Intelligence
stages.description: Database-first company research with Coresignal API fallback

stages.name: Wide Preview Search
stages.description: Cross-departmental employee discovery using Coresignal Preview API

stages.name: Smart Scoring
stages.description: Multi-dimensional scoring: seniority, influence, champion potential, cross-functional ability
stages.result: Top candidates identified before expensive collect API

stages.name: Role Assignment
stages.description: Deal-size-aware role assignment ensuring Decision Maker + Champion
stages.result: Appropriate roles assigned based on deal size

stages.name: Cross-Functional Validation
stages.description: Stakeholder completeness validation across all relevant functions
stages.result: Missing stakeholders added for comprehensive coverage

stages.name: Full Profile Collection
stages.description: Coresignal Collect API for final buyer group members only
stages.result: Complete profiles for final buyer group

buyerGroupJustification.name: Kevin Swim
buyerGroupJustification.title: Workforce Analyst
buyerGroupJustification.detailedReasoning: Single person buyer group - automatically assigned as decision maker
buyerGroupJustification.justification:
**Kevin Swim (Workforce Analyst) - DECISION**

**Budget Authority**: **Department Relevance**: 
**Selection Criteria**:
- Seniority Score: 3/10
- Influence Score: 0/10
- Network Size: 33 connections
- Role Confidence: 70%

recommendations: Add IT stakeholder for technical implementation
Add Security/Legal stakeholder for risk management
Add Finance stakeholder for budget approval

cohesionAnalysis.reasoning: Limited reporting proximity; Limited functional interdependence
recommendations: Consider adding members who report to same executives
Consider adding members from interdependent functions
Overall cohesion could be improved with better stakeholder selection

championAnalysis.analysis: No champions identified - consider adding internal advocates

recommendations: Consider improving buyer group cohesion through better stakeholder selection
Ensure primary business functions are represented
Critical: Add internal champion for advocacy
Consider adding more stakeholders for comprehensive coverage
